short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collaborate with anyone, anywhere using Nikko Talk

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Featuring a set of collaborative tools including file sharing, screen sharing, chat, audio and video conferencing, this extension provides you with just about everything you need to interact with your clients or collaborators.
